org.trianacode.taskgraph.event

Class TaskNodeEvent

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.EventObject
      • org.trianacode.taskgraph.event.TaskNodeEvent
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class TaskNodeEvent
extends java.util.EventObject
    The event generated when a node is added or removed from a task
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Detail

      • TaskNodeEvent

        public TaskNodeEvent(int id,
             Task task,
             Node node,
             int index,
             int absindex)
        Constructs a task node event
        Parameters:
        id - the id of the event (either NODE_ADDED or NODE_REMOVED)
        task - the source of the task property event
        node - the node being added/removed

    • Method Detail

      • getID

        public int getID()
        Returns:
        the id for this event (either NODE_ADDED or NODE_REMOVED)

      • getTask

        public Task getTask()
        Returns:
        the source of the task node event

      • getNode

        public Node getNode()
        Returns:
        the node referenced by this event (could be null if no longer valid)

      • getNodeIndex

        public int getNodeIndex()
        Returns:
        the index of the node being added/removed. In the case of removal, this is the index when the node was removed.

      • getAbsoluteNodeIndex

        public int getAbsoluteNodeIndex()
        Returns:
        the absolute index of the node being added/removedIn the case of removal, this is the index when the node was removed.

      • isInputNode

        public boolean isInputNode()
        Returns:
        the node being added/removed

      • isOutputNode

        public boolean isOutputNode()
        Returns:
        the node being added/removed

      • isDataNode

        public boolean isDataNode()
        Returns:
        the node being added/removed

      • isParameterNode

        public boolean isParameterNode()
        Returns:
        the node being added/removed

      • getParameterName

        public java.lang.String getParameterName()
        Returns:
        the parameter name for this node (null if data node)
